Kali:::

Kali received Shivah's comm link and looking to Panzer. She looked to 
the feline-bot and said with a smile "Well, Panzer, I was thinking 
that your skills could been improved if you like... YOu see. You can 
get new and best weapons and stuff like that if you want..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC: Remember, any training or memory of training would have been 
> ereased. So her training is what Shivah had the computer download 
> into her system 
> 
> Panzer::
> She gave a slight grin. "I have been programed in hand to hand and 
> advanced hand to hand combat. I have been programmed with most 
forms 
> of weapons and my proficiency is quite high. I am programmed to 
recon 
> as well as command an attack. I feel my attach and defence programs 
> are fairly complete. If there is any more training or programming 
> required, please order me to the area in which I should update my 
> programs."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:

> > 
> > "Welcome to our ranks, Panzer"said Kali"Your weapon will come in 
a
